channel.title: Dessert on Cooking Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on Cooking Recipes

item.title: Vegan Compote
item.description: Serves 2 Ingrediants: 8-9 apples (granny smith) some butter sugar depingind on taste, vanilla sugar and/or cinnamon Method: Peel and cut them, not too small. Melt the butter, add the apples, some sugar (+ vanilla etc) at a moderate temperature if too dry add water lease it for 20-25 minutes Don’t be afraid to “brown” it a little, it adds a caramel taste

item.title: 1 Minute Chocolate Lava Mug Cake
item.description: Serves: 2 Ingredients 4 tbsp all purpose flour 4 tbsp sugar 3 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder 1/4 tsp baking powder 1/4 tsp salt 1 egg, beaten 4 tbsp milk Method Into a small bowl add: flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, salt, egg, milk. Mix to combine. Pour mixture into a large sized coffee mug or two smaller coffee mugs. Microwave on high for one minute. If needed {if cake batter is still gooey}, microwave on high for up to an additional 10 seconds.
